value.title: Machine Learning AI Can Predict COVID-19 Survival From Single Blood Test
value.excerpt: Levels of 14 proteins in the blood of critically ill COVID-19 patients are associated with survival. A single blood sample from a critically ill COVID-19 patient can be analyzed by a machine learning model which uses blood plasma proteins to predict survival,
